channel.title: Npcs talk on dodian
channel.description:
Alright I was looking though npchandler and Im not sure where I should put this
[code]if (npcs[i].npcType == 1055) {if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {npcs[i].updateRequired = true;npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;npcs[i].textUpdate = "STOP STEALING FROM THE PIRATES CHEST!"; } [/code]
Where should I add this because no npcs talk in my dodian source so im unsure where to add it does anyone know?
